snippet: Authors United, a group of Hachette writers and allies, is appealing to Amazon’s board to consider their reputation in the battle over e-book pricing.
abstract: Authors United, group of writers published by Hachette, sends letter to Amazon's board warning that its reputation may be at risk if it continues battle over e-book pricing; Amazon has been discouraging customers from buying Hachette's printed books for six months; letter warns that discontent with Amazon, company that has long relied on one of the highest corporate reputations, could easily spread.
lead_paragraph: Authors United, a group of Hachette writers and allies, is appealing to Amazon’s board to consider their reputation in the battle over e-book pricing.

headline.main: In Latest Volley Against Amazon, Hachette’s Writers Target Its Board
headline.print_headline: In Latest Volley Against Amazon, Hachette’s Writers Target Its Board
